title: Senior brand manager
skills:
Dynamic marketing/branding/digital professional with 11 years of progressive experience in various areas, including Brand Marketing, Advertising, Consumer Insights and Market Research.
• Hold responsibility for $ 50 MM+ Net Rev business with full P&L accountability.
• Managed annual marketing budget of $ 30 MM
• Managed development and execution of national consumer programs (including TV, out-door, in-store, Internet ads, event sponsorship, BTL etc.).
• Managed teams of up to 12 subordinates.
• PhD in Journalism.
• Languages: Russian – Native; English – fluent speaker; Spanish – intermediate.

experience.description:
Development and execution of annual communication & insights plan for all banking business lines (retail, corporate, SME, etc.). Defining and optimization of product portfolio based on consumer needs. Spearhead activities for new product development. Accountable for Brand visibility and Brand equity across all customer-related touch points (ATL, BTL, Digital, bank offices). Responsible for marketing budget guidance.

• Brand health volume UBA +10% (2017 vs 2018).
• Development and successful pan launch of new B2C product portfolio (15+ NP from concept to implementation) – 14% SoM in 12 months and still growing.
• Media budget optimization +17% GRP per year.
• Successful lunches of 15+ federal and 10+ regional ATL campaigns, total budget - $ 90+ MM.
• Established consistent contact annual strategy for brand’s communication of SME, corporate investment banking, retail business and private banking (200+ events and plug-ins across Russia).
• Managed 12 subordinates.

Strategic planning and category development. Managing brand performance and P&L. Market activation plan development and implementation – ATL, digital, BTL. Brand and business performance tracking and analysis. Cross-category 360 activation campaigns & customer loyalty programs. Cross-functional team leading and direct reporters managing. 

• Up to 35% NTB clients card activation growth.
• 50+ ROI positive cross-sale campaigns.
• Successful lunches of 10+ federal ATL co-brand campaigns (Aeroflot, One Two Trip, Russian Railways), total budget - $ 40+ MM.
• Managed 5 subordinates.

experience.position: Head of Credit and Deposit Marketing
experience.description:
Strategic planning and category development. Managing brand performance and P&L. Market activation plan development and implementation – ATL, digital, BTL. Brand and business performance tracking and analysis. Cross-category 360 activation campaigns. 

• Up to 27% increased deposit portfolio.
• Channel management implementation for all categories via range optimization and negotiation with key clients (BeeLine, Evroset, Samsung).
• Launch of annual BTL platform offer for retirement audience segment: receiving a pension at bank. 1M customers after two years of promo.
• Managed 2 subordinates.

industries.name: Marketing, Advertising, Designer, Event and PR Agencies

experience.description: Developed business relationships with existing clients (AFI development). Participation in tenders PSN, MIREX group) to solicit new clients, co-ordinating brand development tasks and multi-channel media campaigns.
